document_data.name: Deny Cold
document_data.mainbody: '''''Deny cold''''' was an [[abjuration]] [[spell]] that protected the recipient from natural and [[magic]]al cold.
document_data.Effects: While ''deny cold'' had the same effect as the [[divine]] [[spell]] ''[[resist cold]]'', it actually repelled cold effects rather than fortified the body of the spell's target.
document_data.Casting: The casting of the spell required [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components as well as a patch of fur from an animal.
